title: Beacon-fire: Project Salvation Belles
description: the first perspective of the long-form live interactive film tour, take you through the long river of history, return to the end of the Ning Dynasty, and five beautiful women hand in hand to fight enemy and save the people!
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
### Plot background
You passed through, through the end of the Ning Dynasty, a bureaucrat named Li You. Unexpectedly, you have just passed through and received an S-level task: after 100 days, the enemy slaughtered the city, you urgently need 100,000 taels of silver and 3,000 elite soldiers to resist enemy. As a penniless yamen, how are you going to raise 100,000 silver and 3,000 soldiers? How to save the city, save the five beauties? Is it the wife General's house? Or join hands with the rich women to resist enemy? Is it a joint venture with Huakui? Or join hands with his wife to find out the details of the pirates? The beginning of hell, your every choice will affect the direction of the ending!

### Product feature

**Lots of branches, lots of endings**--337 episodes, 205 choices, take you to 45 endings. Massive plot, infinite possibilities, every choice you make, will usher in unexpected endings.
**Hidden exploration, hidden plot**--Treasure box in the corner, bring unexpected surprises; Mysterious passers-by, open the hidden plot. Your choices and explorations will reveal the mysterious Easter egg feeder and hidden ending.
**First view, live action**--First view immersive interaction, allowing you to experience the story and scene. The whole process of real actors, so that you feel full of real characters and feelings. Five female masters, a variety of interactions - heroic general, national beauty and fragrance of the flower leader, pure and lovely servant girl, charming sexy help, gentle virtuous wife. Five beautiful women will not only accompany you in the story, but also accompany you outside the story, so that you can experience real interaction!
**Historical heritage, feelings of home and country**--In the game, you can learn the real history, you can experience the feelings of the five beautiful women, you can also fight for the country for the people, save the enemy, save the beauty, save the people!

seller.name: LOVE GAMES SHANGHAI NETWORK TECHNOLOGY CO.,LTD
